page.title: 14FARMING
page.content: Farming is very important in the Aslockton and Whatton area. It is mainly an agricultural area, but there are a mixture of different types of farm. The main crop grown is wheat, but oats, barley and rape are also grown. Alot of the farmers fields change what they grow every year. they grow lots of rape because it is used to make margerine and for food for cows. It also fetches alot of money in. This year one farmer grew onions and you could smell them. There is also a poultry farm nearby and some sheep are kept for grazing. One farm in Old Whatton is famous for it's herd of Fresian cattle and bulls. Farmers come to the farm with their cows to get them mated so that they will give lots of milk. The cattle are also worth lots of money.
